# Daniel Banki

* MA in Economics (University of Glasgow, 2016)
* MSc in Behavioural and Economic Science (University of Warwick, 2017)
* MRes in Economics, Finance and Management (Universitat Pompeu Fabra, 2019)
* PhD in Economics, Finance and Management (Universitat Pompeu Fabra, 2020-)

## What I do

I'm a PhD student in Economics at Universitat Pompeu Fabra in Barcelona, Spain. I work on topics related to judgment and decision making.
